name: SnailBoarder
description: Snail Boarder is a single player 3D skateboarding game where the player takes the role of a rad skateboarding snail trying to win a skateboarding competition.The player will have to learn and master various tricks and skills in order to beat out the rest of the competition. Taking advantage of the different styled skatepark around them the player can score more and more points in order to be crowned the king of snail skateboarding!
